title: Requires provision be made for pregnancy termination procedures coverage in every hospital, surgical or medical policy offering maternity care coverage
summary: Requires provision be made for pregnancy termination procedures insurance coverage in every individual or group hospital, surgical or medical policy, or hospital service or medical expense indemnity contract of a service corporation, only where any such policy or contract offers maternity care coverage.

       AN ACT to amend  the  insurance  law,  in  relation  to  requiring  that
         provision  be made for pregnancy termination procedures in every indi-
         vidual or group policy or contract which provides coverage  or  indem-
         nity for hospital, surgical or medical care and which offers maternity
         care coverage
